working_on.notes: Implemented specific Expert feedback: Corrected positions for Thiên Đức, Văn Tinh. Added missing Yearly/Decade stars. Cleaned up noise.

recent_changes.description: Implemented Expert Refinement Round 2: Added missing Yearly and Decade stars.
Corrected Star Brightness and Positions based on Expert Round 1.
Implemented 'anSaoDaiVan' for Decade Stars (ĐV. Lộc, Tứ Hóa, Khôi Việt)
Expanded Static Stars: Đầu Quân, Thiên/Nguyệt Đức, Văn Tinh, Tam Thai/Bát Tọa, Phong Cáo/Thai Phụ

pending_tasks.notes: Use the refined logic to generate the full string.

decisions_made.decision: Use Table Lookup for Lunar Date
decisions_made.reason: Algorithmic approach had drift issues; Lookup is standard and stable.
Arranged Palaces Clockwise and adopted specific Khôi/Việt rules (Can Nhâm) to match user school.
Used 'Ngũ Dần Độn' method from Birth Year Can to determine Can of Dai Van Palace.
